name: Electron (pello)
description:
Keep the electron alive!!

Use your mouse buttons to create atracting/repelling fields. Depending on the distance of the field, the electron will gain speed or it will decrease its velocity.

Beware of other particles: red and yellow will take some life points, but green will give you some extra +30 points.
You can pick and coins as well and try to stay alive as much as possible.
